entries.title_d: The Vortex is sending you to the Lok system. There you will meet up with a Rebel officer that has the location of an Imperial scientist that you need to kidnap.
entries.title: Lok system: Get information needed to kidnap Imperial scientist.
entries.thanks_5: Thanks for taking care of the Corsair. Transmit is almost done.
entries.thanks_4: Thanks for taking care of the Corsair. Transmit is almost done.
entries.thanks_3: Thanks for taking care of the Corsair. Transmit is almost done.
entries.thanks_2: Thanks for taking care of the Corsair. Transmit is almost done.
entries.thanks_1: Thanks for taking care of the Corsair. Transmit is almost done.
entries.taunt_4: I've got you in my sights.
entries.taunt_2: If you release your cargo peacefully, we will not harm you.
entries.taunt_1: Kill your engines and prepare to be boarded.
entries.split_quest_alert: Transmission of necessary data complete. Proceed to intercept spot and disable the Imperial shuttle.
entries.shields_depleted: My shields are failing, get them off me! I'm not done transmitting the data.
entries.reason_5: Sorry I'm late, I had to avoid some Corsair pirates. I have the information you need. Lets keep moving as I transmit it. You will need to disable and inspect the Imperial shuttle to make sure the scientist is onboard.
entries.reason_4: Sorry I'm late, I had to avoid some Corsair pirates. I have the information you need. Lets keep moving as I transmit it. You will need to disable and inspect the Imperial shuttle to make sure the scientist is onboard.
entries.reason_3: Sorry I'm late, I had to avoid some Corsair pirates. I have the information you need. Lets keep moving as I transmit it. You will need to disable and inspect the Imperial shuttle to make sure the scientist is onboard.
entries.reason_2: Sorry I'm late, I had to avoid some Corsair pirates. I have the information you need. Lets keep moving as I transmit it. You will need to disable and inspect the Imperial shuttle to make sure the scientist is onboard.
entries.reason_1: Sorry I'm late, I had to avoid some Corsair pirates. I have the information you need. Lets keep moving as I transmit it. You will need to disable and inspect the Imperial shuttle to make sure the scientist is onboard.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: The Rebel officer will meet you at these coordinates. Hurry over there.
entries.quest_location_d: The Alliance officer will meet you in the Lok system, proceed to there immediately.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort Finn Darktrin while he's transmitting the coordinates of the Imperial scientist.
entries.panic_5: Blasted Corsairs, they are everywhere now a days!
entries.panic_4: Pirate fighters heading our way, get ready pilot!
entries.panic_1: I guess those Corsairs doesn't give up, keep them busy while I transmit the ship signature data and intercept coordinates to you.
entries.hull_half: I'm tracking multiple hull breaches! I can't take much more damage. Help!
entries.goodbye_5: Transmission complete. If there's any of those Corsairs that ambushed us left, take them out to make sure they didn't listen in on our transmission. Good luck!
entries.goodbye_4: Transmission complete. If there's any of those Corsairs that ambushed us left, take them out to make sure they didn't listen in on our transmission. Good luck!
entries.goodbye_3: Transmission complete. If there's any of those Corsairs that ambushed us left, take them out to make sure they didn't listen in on our transmission. Good luck!
entries.goodbye_2: Transmission complete. If there's any of those Corsairs that ambushed us left, take them out to make sure they didn't listen in on our transmission. Good luck!
entries.goodbye_1: Transmission complete. If there's any of those Corsairs that ambushed us left, take them out to make sure they didn't listen in on our transmission. Good luck!
entries.found_loc: Uploaded coordinates to rendez-vous with subject: Finn Darktrin.
entries.failed_protect: Finn Darktrin's vessel has jumped to hyperspace without finishing transmission.
entries.failed_destroy: Finn Darktrin's vessel have been terminated. Transmission was not complete upon destruction.
entries.complete: Vessel belonging to Finn Darktrin leaving area.
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: Arrived at rendez-vous coordinates. Detecting incoming vessel.
entries.abort: My ship is falling apart, I'm out of here!
